Package ca.ualberta.c301w13t12recipes.view

View package, contains the classes for Activities and UI interfaces fulfill the view part of the MVC model

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AddCompleteWizardActivity AddCompleteWizardActivity is the activity of last step that can store the complete recipe object into the database
AddIngredWizardActivity Activity class for adding ingredient wizard
AddPicWizardActivity Activity class for adding picture wizard
AddTitleDescWizardActivity Activity class for adding details of the recipe
EditTitleDescWizardActivity User is able to edit their recipe by using this activity
HelpManualActivity This activity shows the help document
IngredientsFridgeActivity Finding online recipes by using ingredients that user provided.
MainActivity Main activity class for main menu
SearchActivity Users are able to search recipes both online and offline
SearchIngredientResultActivity Shows the result of searching by only using ingredients
ViewDetailedRecipeActivity This is the activity, which is provided a view of each entry includes the image , name of user , description
ViewListActivity Activity class for listview
 

Package ca.ualberta.c301w13t12recipes.view Description

View package, contains the classes for Activities and UI interfaces fulfill the view part of the MVC model
